show.title: Bend the waist
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/YyftZr
show.description: In the heart of campus life, a young university student experiences love for the very first time. Between lectures, late-night chats, and awkward confessions, emotions run deep and dreams begin to shift. This is a tender coming-of-age romance where youth, vulnerability, and love collide under the college sky.
show.description_secondary: In the heart of campus life, a young university student experiences love for the very first time. Between lectures, late-night chats, and awkward confessions, emotions run deep and dreams begin to shift. This is a tender coming-of-age romance where youth, vulnerability, and love collide under the college sky.
